definitions.definition: A semiaquatic monotreme from eastern Australia with a bill resembling that of a duck , that has a mole -like body, a tail resembling that of a beaver , a waterproof pelt , and flat webbed feet ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus ).

main_definition: A semiaquatic monotreme from eastern Australia with a bill resembling that of a duck , that has a mole -like body, a tail resembling that of a beaver , a waterproof pelt , and flat webbed feet ( Ornithorhynchus anatinus ).
